pages.text: Steel is a new Midgame material, used for machinery and tech items.

you can make steel ingots by putting any iron item (blocks/ingots/raw) as well as a coal item (blocks/item) in an $(l:contentcraft:blocks/alloy_forge)Alloy Forge$().$(br2)$(6)$(l)TIP:$() you can use a mod like JEI to view all the recipes added by Contentcraft and other mods!
